org.mechio.impl.motion.rxtx.serial

Class RXTXSerialPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
      • org.mechio.impl.motion.rxtx.serial.RXTXSerialPort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeSource

    public class RXTXSerialPort
extends org.jflux.api.common.rk.property.PropertyChangeNotifier
    A SerialPort using the RXTX library. This class is not thread safe.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson

        parity - parity
